Question: In 1966 this person signed a deal with Bert Berns's Bang Records, then a subsidiary of Atlantic Records.
Hints: This person was born in Brooklyn, New York, to a Jewish family descended from Russian and Polish immigrants.
On August 25, 2008, this person performed at Ohio State University while suffering from laryngitis.
Ironically, this person himself had performed in radio ads for H.I.S.
